meanings.sent1: The chef prepared an albuminous omelette for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The albuminous egg whites gave the cake a fluffy texture.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted an albuminous cloud in the sky, resembling a fluffy pillow.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as albuminous as a freshly whipped meringue.
meanings.sent5: The albuminous foam on top of the cappuccino looked like a cloud in a cup.

meanings.sent1: The doctor ordered an albuminous test to check the protein levels.
meanings.sent2: The albuminous solution was used in the laboratory experiment.
meanings.sent3: The scientist made an albuminous joke about protein shakes.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to fitness was as albuminous as the protein powder he consumed.
meanings.sent5: The albuminous smell of the lab reminded her of boiled eggs.
